title: ID font, modern blocks.
content:

author: kidcranium

comments.content:
Is this designed by Non-Format? They create their own custom fonts (although a lot of them look like they probably start as existing fonts with big strokes added).

- Lex
Hi Lex, No its by Synthetic Automatic.
